context: I'm super- thanks! I love watching movies! What kind of movies are you looking for?
I love a little bit of everything, but how about a couple action movies. Something fun for a movie night with friends.
resp: I love action movies- I really like martial arts movies! Rush Hour (1998) is always a good one - funny and full of action!
